message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Alice, your initial offer wasn't bad, but I'm confident we can find something more mutually beneficial. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?
Bob, it seems we both want a larger share.  Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing 58/42.
Alice, time is running out and the pot is shrinking.  Let's settle this - I propose a 52/48 split in my favor. This offer won't be on the table much longer.
Bob, I understand the pressure of the shrinking pot, but I'm also trying to be fair. 57/43 is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this 51/49 split before inflation eats up all the profit.  This is your last chance.
